name: MicroProfile OpenTracing 3.0
body:
MicroProfile OpenTracing 3.0

[Javadocs](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-3.0/apidocs/) | [Spec PDF](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-3.0/microprofile-opentracing-spec-3.0.pdf)|[Spec html](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-3.0/microprofile-opentracing-spec-3.0.html)

Coordinates on maven central:

```xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.eclipse.microprofile.opentracing</groupId>
  <artifactId>microprofile-opentracing-api</artifactId>
  <version>3.0</version>
</dependency>
```

```xml
</dependency>
```

[Javadocs](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-2.0-RC2/apidocs/) | [Spec PDF](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-2.0-RC2/microprofile-opentracing-spec-2.0-RC2.pdf) |[Spec html](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-2.0-RC2/microprofile-opentracing-spec-2.0-RC2.html)

Jenkins Job: https://ci.eclipse.org/microprofile/job/MicroProfile%20Releases/423/

name: Release 2.0-RC1
body:
First release candidate for 2.0 

[Javadocs](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-2.0-RC1/apidocs/) | [Spec PDF](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-2.0-RC1/microprofile-opentracing-spec-2.0-RC1.pdf) |[Spec html](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-2.0-RC1/microprofile-opentracing-spec-2.0-RC1.html)

Jenkins Job: https://ci.eclipse.org/microprofile/job/MicroProfile%20Releases/397/

Changelog
* Exclude transitive dependency on `javax.el-api` (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/196[#196])
* Make OSGI dependency provided (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/190[#190])
* Remove OpenTracing API from WAR in TCK (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/183[#183])
* Update OpenTracing API to 0.33.0 (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/177[#177])
* Update Arquillian version in TCK to 1.6.0 (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/168[#168])
* Use Jakarta EE 8 APIs instead of Java EE 7 and remove dependency on Jackson (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/162[#162])

name: Release 1.3-RC1
body:
The first release candidate for 1.3
Jenkins job: https://hudson.eclipse.org/microprofile/job/MicroProfile%20Releases/161/
Nexus staging repo: https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/orgeclipsemicroprofile-1143
The changelog is in spec package. It will be copied to the final release.

name: Release 1.2.1
body:
[Javadocs](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-1.2.1/apidocs/) | [Spec PDF](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-1.2.1/microprofile-opentracing-spec-1.2.1.pdf) |[Spec html](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-1.2.1/microprofile-opentracing-spec-1.2.1.html)
Jenkins Job: https://hudson.eclipse.org/microprofile/job/MicroProfile%20Releases/133/

Changelog

* Split tree equals in TCK and remove logs from server spans (#132)
* Remove servlets from TCK and use context root to test MP Metrics, OpenAPI, Health URLs (#127)
* Clarified default skip pattern value (#126)
* Added HTTP method to http-path operation name (#125)
* Added tests for ClientTracingRegistrar (#105)
* Update metadata in pom.xml (#101)
* Renamed test class to match OpenTracing (#106)

name: Release 1.2.1-RC1
body:
The first release candidate for 1.2.1

Jenkins Job: https://hudson.eclipse.org/microprofile/job/MicroProfile%20Releases/132/
Staging Repository: https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/orgeclipsemicroprofile-1124

name: Release 1.2
body:
[Javadocs](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-1.2/apidocs/) | [Spec PDF](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-1.2/microprofile-opentracing-spec-1.2.pdf) |[Spec html](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-opentracing-1.2/microprofile-opentracing-spec-1.2.html)
Jenkins Job: https://hudson.eclipse.org/microprofile/job/MicroProfile%20Releases/127

Changelog
* By default will not trace endpoints associated with MicroProfile Metrics, Health and OpenAPI (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/95)
* Added logging exceptions thrown by explicit instrumentation (`@Traced`)(https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/94)
* Added server operation name provider (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/90)
* Removed `geronimo-antinject` and `javax.annotation` dependencies for API module (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/92)
* Added support for server side skip pattern (https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/pull/86)

name: OpenTracing 1.1
body:
The final 1.1 release of MicroProfile OpenTracing 1.1. 

Resolved issues: https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-opentracing/milestone/2?closed=1

name: OpenTracing 1.1-RC1
body:
The first release candidate for `microprofile-opentracing:1.1`

Microprofile-OpenTracing 1.1 release: https://projects.eclipse.org/projects/technology.microprofile/releases/opentracing-1.1
Staging repository: https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/orgeclipsemicroprofile-1076/

The final release of MicroProfile OpenTracing 1.0, which is intended to go into MicroProfile 1.3.
API, spec and TCK are complete.

name: OpenTracing 1.0-RC3
body:
The third release candidate of MicroProfile OpenTracing 1.0, which is intended to go into MicroProfile 1.3.
API, spec and TCK are complete. Making sure build completes successfully.

name: 1.0-RC2
body:
The second release candidate of MicroProfile OpenTracing 1.0, which is intended to go into MicroProfile 1.3.
API has not changed. Spec is pretty much complete, with one pending PR for a minor update. TCK is complete, except for 1 addition needed for pending spec update.

name: 1.0-RC1
body:
The first release candidate of MicroProfile OpenTracing 1.0, which is intended to go into MicroProfile 1.3.
API has not changed for some time. Spec is basically correct and agreed to. Spec may need some additions. TCK has been used, but needs more tests added.
